title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.11 - Learner, trainee, or apprentice rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.11 - Learner, trainee, or apprentice rates

State Regulations

Any employees whom an employer designates learners, trainees, or apprentices must nonetheless be paid at least the minimum rates
prescribed in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-2.11

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
